channel.title: NPC's all only drop bones and charms?
channel.description:
Hey guys i know this is kinda a vague question and if you need me to post anything or search anything i will. I really need help as ive spent so long trying to figure this out. All my monsters in my server only drop bones and charms, but in all my NPCDrop files it shows that i have all the different drops coded... Does anyone know whats going on? Maybe its a client sided thing? Idk please help.. Like i said ill do anything i can to help
This is the source im using.. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548963.20.html
P.S. i am semi new to coding but i just wanna learn and do this for fun :)

item.title: NPC's all only drop bones and charms?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“cane191, post:1, topic:475628”]Hey guys i know this is kinda a vague question and if you need me to post anything or search anything i will. I really need help as ive spent so long trying to figure this out. All my monsters in my server only drop bones and charms, but in all my NPCDrop files it shows that i have all the different drops coded… Does anyone know whats going on? Maybe its a client sided thing? Idk please help… Like i said ill do anything i can to help

This is the source im using… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548963.20.html

P.S. i am semi new to coding but i just wanna learn and do this for fun :)[/quote]

Sometimes it could be because the other drops in the npcdrops file are sent to such a rare drop rate that you’re not getting them.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC's all only drop bones and charms?
